channel.title: Comments on: If Famous Authors Wrote Fanfic – Vol. 1
channel.description: Essays, art, and comics of the unexpected

item.title: By: Tory
item.dc:creator: Tory
item.description:
FANFIC != SLASHFIC. Dag.
Alsoes.
That's totally Xander holding a chain of Rearden Metal. Technically Harris Metal. I AM HUGE NERD.
item.content:encoded:
FANFIC != SLASHFIC. Dag.

Alsoes.

That’s totally Xander holding a chain of Rearden Metal. Technically Harris Metal. I AM HUGE NERD.

item.title: By: Random_Tangent
item.dc:creator: Random_Tangent
item.description:
Just keep telling yourself she doesn't have a whole folder full of slash hidden on her computer.
Whatever it takes to sleep at night.
item.content:encoded:
Just keep telling yourself she doesn’t have a whole folder full of slash hidden on her computer.

Whatever it takes to sleep at night.

item.title: By: Your Anomalous Fan
item.dc:creator: Your Anomalous Fan
item.description:
Hey, it could be worse. That could be slashfic and you could be subjected to some sort of horrific Harry / Ron / Snape sort of... thing.
*urp*
item.content:encoded:
Hey, it could be worse. That could be slashfic and you could be subjected to some sort of horrific Harry / Ron / Snape sort of… thing.
